mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, fid, i_frame, icon, name, sort, target, type, url from sys_menu where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu(id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, fid, i_frame, icon, name, sort, target, type, url) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{fid}, #{iFrame}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{target}, #{type}, #{url})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_menu where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, fid, i_frame, icon, name, sort, target, type, url from sys_menu a where delete_flag = 0 and i_frame = #{data}

#{deptIds}
select a.id menuId, a.name menuName, (select count(*) = 1 from sys_dept_menu where dept_id = #{deptId} and menu_id = a.id) as mark from sys_menu a where delete_flag = 0 and type = 1;
